abstract.para: The library &library; provides methods to parse a text and generate any XML language be it html, soap or xsl.

The program &program; uses this library to transform text from a file into xml after which it is possible to store it in a file or send it to any program for conversion to other types or for checking. examples are xsltproc, xmllint, rnv, wkhtmltopdf and xep.

sect1.title: Introduction of &library;
sect1.para: Welcome to &library; . &library; is a Perl 6 module to convert a semi xml text into XML . This article will explain the language this module can parse.
